title._content: [Dr. Peter Brown Wyckoff house, Gin Lane, Southampton, New York. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. [Dr. Peter Brown Wyckoff house, Gin Lane, Southampton, New York. Flower border] [1914] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House Architecture:: Barney & Chapman, built circa 1900. Landscape: Hicks Nursery, Jericho, New York, circa 1900. Associated Name:, Cora Dillon (Mrs. Peter B.) Wyckoff. Other: Later known as "Wooldon Manor." Today: House razed and gardens subdivided from 1941. On slide (handwritten): "W" and "Wyckoff, Mrs. Peter." Also, blue star sticker. Photographed when Frances Benjamin Johnston and Mattie Edwards Hewitt worked together. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16853 Call Number: LC-J717-X109- 48
